interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Wahl Smart Shave Rechargeable lithium ion wet / dry water proof foil shaver for men. Smartshave technology for shaving, trimming, and wet or dry shave with precision ground trimmer blade #7061-900
Review Date: 2017/01/15
Store: WAHL
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Brand': 'WAHL', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Beard, Face', 'Special Feature': 'Pop Up Trimmer', 'Power Source': 'Battery Powered', 'Included Components': 'Clipper, Cleaning Brush, Battery, Charger'}
Review Text: My husband is very happy with this razor. I think of Wahl as a hair clipper and probably wouldn't have thought of them when replacing his razor, but I am glad to have learned that they make just as good of a quality razor. He uses a regular razor in the shower, then runs an electric around to catch any missed spots. Because of this the battery doesn't need to be charged very often. The battery life indicator is very helpful as is the razor's ability to charge very quickly. He likes it. He is not raving about it being the best razor ever, but we are both happy with this unit.
Review Title: Working just fine
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Neutrogena Fragrance-Free Lightweight Body Oil for Dry Skin, Sheer Moisturizer in Light Sesame Formula, 8.5 fl. oz
Neutrogena
['While Neutrogena strives to keep ingredient lists on this website as accurate as possible, we cannot guarantee that these lists are complete, reliable, up-to-date, and error-free. Please refer to the ingredients list on the product packaging for the most accurate list of ingredients.']
{'Brand': 'Neutrogena', 'Scent': 'Unscented', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Active Ingredients': 'Isopropyl myristate, sesamum indicum (sesame) seed oil, PEG-40 sorbitan peroleate, propylparaben', 'Unit Count': '8.50 Ounce', 'Package Dimensions': '7.8 x 2 x 2 inches; 9.77 Ounces'}
The oil itself is great, but to me it smells like suntan oil. I use coconut oil, also scented but very lightly and it dissipates quickly, after a shower. Although I love Neutrogena stuff and use many of their products, I will stick to [[ASIN:B00P8CQK90 Fractionated Coconut Oil - 100% Pure Premium Grade - PUMP + SQUEEZE CAP + FREE Recipe eBook! - BIG 16Oz - Best Carrier Oil & Base For Essential Oils, Aromatherapy & Massage - Great for Roll-On Bottles - Soothing for Skin & Hair!]]
Smells like suntan oil
Wahl Smart Shave Rechargeable lithium ion wet / dry water proof foil shaver for men. Smartshave technology for shaving, trimming, and wet or dry shave with precision ground trimmer blade #7061-900
WAHL

My husband is very happy with this razor. I think of Wahl as a hair clipper and probably wouldn't have thought of them when replacing his razor, but I am glad to have learned that they make just as good of a quality razor. He uses a regular razor in the shower, then runs an electric around to catch any missed spots. Because of this the battery doesn't need to be charged very often. The battery life indicator is very helpful as is the razor's ability to charge very quickly. He likes it. He is not raving about it being the best razor ever, but we are both happy with this unit.
Working just fine
profile:
**User Profile Summary**

- **Product Preferences**: The user favors fragrance-free or unscented skincare products, evident in their choice of a lightweight body oil. They dislike scents reminiscent of suntan oil, indicating a strong preference for neutral or subtle fragrances.

- **Skin Care Focus**: The user is concerned with moisturizing solutions for dry skin, particularly effective hydrating options, with a notable inclination towards natural oils.

- **Brand Loyalty**: The user exhibits brand loyalty to Neutrogena as a trusted choice for skincare, despite some dissatisfaction with scent experiences in certain products. This also extends to appreciation for quality in other grooming products.

- **Ingredient Awareness**: The user is aware of product ingredients and their effects, emphasizing the importance of accurate ingredient lists in their evaluations.

- **Additional Product Usage**: The user utilizes coconut oil, indicating a preference for natural, multi-purpose oils for skincare.

- **Grooming Product Awareness**: The user's recent interaction with a grooming product demonstrates a willingness to explore quality options outside their typical skincare preferences, showcasing a balanced approach to personal care by considering functionality and product performance.

- **Overall Experience**: The user maintains a thoughtful and balanced evaluation style, rating products based on both functionality and sensory experience, applying this methodology across skincare and grooming products alike.
